Regulation Name(s): Factor V Leiden DNA Mutation Detection Systems
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Thermal cycler (e.g., ABI GeneAmp PCR System 9700, ABI Veriti, MJ Research PTC-100)
PC with Invader Call Reporter Software
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Invader MTHFR 1298 qualitative genotyping test for detection of MTHFR A1298C polymorphism in genomic DNA from whole blood using PCR and Invader chemistry
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test intended for detection and genotyping of the A to C mutation at position 1298 of the human MTHFR gene in genomic DNA from whole blood potassium EDTA samples from patients with suspected thrombophilia
